item.title: Despite intense AI arms race, we’re in for a multi-modal future
item.description: There will be no single model that will rule the universe, neither next year nor next decade. Instead, the future of AI will be multi-model.

item.title: CES 2025 tips and tricks: A guide to tech’s biggest trade show
item.description: CES 2025 is coming to Las Vegas during the week of January 5, and it will be one of the biggest tech expos in the world again.
